scripts.compile:binaries: npm run build && mkdir -p bin && PATH="$HOME/.bun/bin:$PATH" bun build --compile --target=bun-darwin-arm64 --outfile bin/trxcategorisation-macos-arm64 dist/cli.js && PATH="$HOME/.bun/bin:$PATH" bun build --compile --target=bun-linux-x64 --outfile bin/trxcategorisation-linux-x64 dist/cli.js && PATH="$HOME/.bun/bin:$PATH" bun build --compile --target=bun-linux-arm64 --outfile bin/trxcategorisation-linux-arm64 dist/cli.js
